name: OBJECT_VERSION_ID
documentation: Globally unique identifier for one version of a versioned object; lexical form: `object_id  '::' creating_system_id  '::' version_tree_id`.

object_id.name: object_id
object_id.documentation: Unique identifier for logical object of which this identifier identifies one version; normally the `_object_id_` will be the unique identifier of the version container containing the version referred to by this `OBJECT_VERSION_ID` instance.

creating_system_id.name: creating_system_id
creating_system_id.documentation: Identifier of the system that created the Version corresponding to this Object version id.

version_tree_id.name: version_tree_id
version_tree_id.documentation: Tree identifier of this version with respect to other versions in the same version tree, as either 1 or 3 part dot-separated numbers, e.g.  1 ,  2.1.4 .

is_branch.name: is_branch
is_branch.documentation: True if this version identifier represents a branch.
